title: The IDW: People or Protocol?
description:
If you have heard of the IDW, or Intellectual Dark Web, a group of academics usually come to mind. But what if the spirit of the IDW had more to do with discourse than a group? I have a fascinating chat with Ryan Bennett, who fleshes out this idea

Podcast version: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-IDW-People-or-Protocol-e3r0f8

Podcast: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-IDW-People-or-Protocol-e3r0f8

Follow Ryan on twitter @Ry_Nomad

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
